**Say hello to the most powerful and composable router out there! :P**

- First release, `standard-version` from now on
- quickstart guide
- update docs
- bump to `koa-better-router@2`
- add highlights
- improve coverage
- add table of contents
- finish tests
- update keywords
- implementation
